item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Queen: The Miracle Album - Music Videos + Alternated Expanded Versions
item.description:
Hi all,

Just brushing up on my Queen collection and came across these two special expanded releases of their MIRACLE album, Red & Blue Editions. https://www.discogs.com/release/162...le-Expanded-Collectors-Edition-Red-Collection

I believe this was a Japan exclusive?

I was wondering if anyone has/can upload the DVD features from these? I would love to see the alternate videos listed here:

https://www.imagebam.com/view/MEU6NAB

Thank you!
item.author: musique.pop
